Detailed Description

The str module includes all objects for string manipulation.

When performing string operations, it is sometimes the case that the Standard Library std::string class is simply not enough. The str module is a conglomeration of useful string manipulations including a Tokenizer class and a c-style formatting functions.

This library is intended to compliment the STL while providing additional functionality that the standard lacks
